input_args.passage: 'R.G. Springsteen | R.G. Springsteen is known as an Director, Assistant Director, and Unit Manager. Some of his work includes Gunsmoke, Lassie, Rawhide, Wanted: Dead or Alive, ...'
input_args.claim: "Since there is no mention of him working in any other countries in either or, it's safe to conclude that he was affiliated with the United States as a director."
